person.persName: Alpheus B. Miller (Louisville Brick Layer/2nd/34th KY Infantry)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, brick layer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda Miller. Father of Charles Miller, George Miller, Florence Miller, Mary Miller, and Joseph Miller. Brick layer in Louisville in 1860. Enlisted as a private in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on October 15, 1861.
